lines.text: [Scolex contemplates on a nickname]
Too bad Hook is taken, eh?
How 'bout Captain Claw?
Or Santa Claw?
Just Claw, one word... like Madonna.
I don't know what you're up to, Claw, but I will stop you.
Aw touché, Inspector, I think someone has been watching way too many Saturday morning cartoons.
I deserve a dashing appellation.
A dashing appellation. What is that? A hillbilly with a tuxedo?
"Fast" and "WOW! What Was That?"
I'll go after them; and you say 10-4!
Right. See ya!
[speeds off after some escaped convicts, leaving Gadget just standing there]
I owe you one, Scolex. You wrecked my car, and I really liked that car.
Well, you crushed my hand and I really liked that hand. So Go-Go get over it!
I look just like you! Only prettier... hey, I bet we even share brain waves! Are you thinking about Gelato? Cause I am!
OK... I'm going to go find John.
[walks away]
Aw, well, don't you wanna hang out?
I'll be with you every step of the way!
Okay. I'd shake your hand, but you might lose an eye.

[two guys are trying to steal a Dodge Viper but Inspector Gadget doesn't notice that they are actually ecaped convicts and this upsets the Gadgetmobile]
That's it. I can't take this anymore. Step away from the Viper!
Justice will be served.

[as Robo Gadget is attacking the city in a Godzilla-like fashion; in English subtitles]
This is why I left Tokyo!
[during the credits, RoboBrenda is doing an exercise show that only she can do, as she is spinning seemingly uncontrollably]
And kick, and kick and kick and kick and kick and kick and fall!
[RoboBrenda falls off the deck onto the beach which isn't too far down]

[after being defeated by Inspector Gadget]
Arrivederci, Gadget! This is NOT goodbye. I'll get you next time, Gadget! I'll get you!
Thelma, how do I look?
Like a geek from Kansas who became a security guard.
Dr. Bradford? Hi. I borrowed a book from your dad. "Power Learning Through Speed Study." It took me forever to get through it.
Wowser!
